name: Tangerine Massacre
description:
Part of the Ludum Dare Game Jam #49. Theme: Unstable! 

You are an unstable psychopath hell bent on killing ALL the Tangerinos! Don’t let them stop you, or take down as many of them as you can before they stop you! You’re not the only thing that’s unstable. The floors are too!

Controls

WSAD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Attack

How to Play

1. Chop the Tangerines for points!

2. The Tangerines will throw apples at you in the hopes of thwarting your rampage. However, a well timed attack on an incoming apple will DEFLECT it back at the Tangerine! Mastering this is the key to a high score!

3. Moving around will crack and eventually crumble the unstable ground. Destroying the field will also give you points! But be careful, if you destroy too much of the field, it will be harder to move around and make you vulnerable to the Tangerine assault!

Have fun and comment below your high score! The developer high score is 814.

Changelog

[6 Oct 2021]

  • Fix extremely low fps on some devices

[5 Oct 2021]

  • Initial release
